name: Issufi Badji
description: Web Developer and Information Systems graduate
about_me: I'm Issufi Badji, a full stack developer with over 6 years of programming experience. My passion for software development, technology and innovation is what motivates me to keep learning and evolving. I have a degree in Information Technology from SECITEC and a degree in Information Systems from the Federal University of Mato Grosso (UFMT). I'm currently studying for a master's degree in Computing at the Fluminense Federal University (UFF). In addition, I work as an Analyst and Senior Developer at TTY2000 in the Federal Regional Court of the 2nd Region (TRF2), always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow professionally.Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
